BasicInfo.short: Connects cloud-based apps through prebuilt connectors and a rich do-it-yourself integration platform

Products.name: Lockbox Connector
Products.description: Automates the secure capture of customer payments to your bank account, plus secure payments to invoices of your NetSuite account.

Products.name: SmartConnectors
Products.description: Pre-built integrations based on business processes that are turnkey but highly customizable.

Products.name: Productivity Apps
Products.description: Integration apps that increase productivity: connect NetSuite with Google Apps, Microsoft Excel and Amazon S3; Salesforce with O365

Products.name: integrator.io
Products.description: The Celigo integrator.io is a modern, do-it-yourself integration platform that connects all types of data sources and applications.
